title: The lists of uses mentioned under various land use zones herein above may be amended by the Authority from time to time with the consent of Director of Town Planning, Maharashtra State, Pune
clause_text: The lists of uses mentioned under various land use zones herein above may be amended by the Authority from time to time with the consent of Director of Town Planning, Maharashtra State, Pune.
